page.title: 20BRANT BROUGHTON STATISTICS
page.content: The 1981 census shows there to be 637 people living in the combined parishes of Brant Broughton and Stragglethorpe. 250 people work - 168 men and 82 women. 61 percent of households are owner occupied, 20 percent council owned and 19 percent rented mainly by virtue of employment or as unfurnished accommodation.{ { (DATA FROM OPCS 1981 CENSUS SAS, {Crown copyright) { { Thanks are due to all those who took {part in interviews or questionnaires, {or who provided information about the {village. { The information contained within {these 20 pages was compiled and {collated by some pupils and the {headteacher from Brant Broughton {CE/Methodist Primary School.
